subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alfonso Soriano is one of only four players in the last 60 years to make their debuts with the Yankees and go on to collect 2,000 career hits, joining Derek Jeter, Bernie Williams and Don Mattingly.
snippet: Alfonso Soriano is one of only four players in the last 60 years to make their debuts with the Yankees and go on to collect 2,000 career hits, joining Derek Jeter, Bernie Williams and Don Mattingly.
